summary: Completed comprehensive testing of billing application with updated features: customer name/phone fields (optional), print type selection (thermal/A4), auto-print after sale completion, and complete sale flow integration. All major features working correctly.

minor_fixes_applied.fix_applied: Added timezone consistency handling for datetime comparisons

validation_issues.issue: Cash payment requires cash received amount to be specified
validation_issues.note: This is correct business logic behavior, not a bug

passed_tests: Customer name and phone fields (optional) in retail sales
Customer name and phone fields (optional) in wholesale sales
Print type selection (Thermal 80mm vs A4 Paper)
Bill format without customer details (optional fields)
